(c) What must be the distance from sphere <math alttext="A"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>A</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> to sphere <math alttext="C"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>C</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> on the right such that the original small sphere remains at rest?
